scenes.visual: The video begins with a black-and-white shot of Donald Trump and another man standing behind podiums labeled 'TECH PROSPERITY DEAL.' The background features wood paneling, framed portraits, and a piano. The scene transitions to color, revealing the men in suits. The camera angle remains static, focusing on the two men at the podiums. The setting includes flags and a formal backdrop, emphasizing the official nature of the event.

Donald Trump and Keir Starmer stand at their respective podiums. The setting is formal, with flags of the United States and the United Kingdom prominently displayed behind them. The room has wood-paneled walls adorned with framed portraits and a floral arrangement. The camera angle remains steady, focusing on the two leaders as they engage in a discussion. There are no significant changes in the frame during this period, maintaining a consistent view of the press conference setting.
